title: GHM SCRVNR Voice Profile
description: Voice DNA for a web property brand. One profile per brand identity (not per client â€” a client can have multiple brands).

reading_level.description: FK grade level of source copy. Decimal.

sentence_rhythm.description: Burstiness: ratio of std_dev to mean sentence length. >0.60 = human-natural variance. <0.40 = AI-flat.

contraction_rate.description: Fraction of eligible positions where contractions appear (0.0-1.0).

technical_specificity.description: low | moderate | high | very-high. Does copy commit to specific numbers, model names, failure modes, measurements?

register.description: first | second | third. What grammatical person dominates the copy?

trust_signal_pattern.description: certification-led | tenure-referenced | specific-claim | social-proof | authority-led | mixed

native_constructions.description: Phrases, patterns, or sentence structures native to this brand voice. Used in Pass 2 alignment scoring.

negative_space.description: What this voice never says. Patterns that would be out of character. Used as negative markers in Pass 2.

vocabulary.description: Type-token ratio approximation. Higher = more varied vocabulary.

intake_interview_data.description: For Tier 3 profiles built from scratch, not extraction. Stores raw intake answers.
